_sText:
mg_3k_smash_lego_copter
Feel free to message me with any questions by joining the following group and opening a chat with me @ [SG] Pauls Group
MAP NOW FIXED FOR LINUX SERVERS - SERVER OWNERS PLEASE JUST REPLACE THE FILE ON YOUR SERVER. CLIENTS DO NOT HAVE TO REDOWNLOAD THE MAP.
About The Map - Dodge and avoid the flying blocks by running around onto different platforms. - Survive for 90 seconds. - To access and drive the chopper then get a lucky physics boost or bhop into the middle of the hole. - Finish of the opposing team in one of four random endings.
Map Info - One driveable helictoper that can drop blocks. (Right click to drop, 8 second respawn time) - Four random map endings. - One easter egg (not including the choppa). - 40 Player spawn points. - Custom Textures. - Custom Sound.
Map Endings
Ice Skate
 In the iceskating ending everyone must grab a knife and meet in the middle. They must iceskate (strafing like you would do with surfin). Note: Smash blocks are still flying out of the hole so dont get crushed by one!
Climb
 Pretty simple ending if you are a half decent climber. Race the opposing team to the awp's, but be aware of falling objects and the smash blocks.
Knife Fight
 Knife fight the opposing team around the centre of the map (smash blocks) on platforms that go up and down on touch. Dont get hit by the blocks!
Low Gravity Scoutsknives
 Grab a scout and a knife. Duke it out on the floating platforms!
